ai-ja405:1.1_0: “Gotama, we seventy-two merit-makers are now wielders of power,
ai-ja405:1.2_0: having passed beyond rebirth and old age.
ai-ja405:1.3_0: This is our last rebirth as a holy man,
ai-ja405:1.4_0: And now many people pray to us.”
ai-ja405:2.1_0: “But, Baka, the life span here is short, not long,
ai-ja405:2.3_0: I know that your life span
ai-ja405:3.1_0: “Blessed One, I am the one of infinite vision,
ai-ja405:3.2_0: who does not arise for rebirth and death.
ai-ja405:3.3_0: What precepts and observances did I practice in the past?
ai-ja405:3.4_0: Explain to me so I may know.”
ai-ja405:4.2_0: who were oppressed by thirst and heat.
ai-ja405:4.3_0: That’s the precepts and observances you practiced in the past.
ai-ja405:4.4_0: I recollect it like one who has wakened from sleep.
ai-ja405:5.1_0: When people at Deer River Bank were seized,
ai-ja405:5.3_0: That’s the precepts and observances you practiced in the past.
ai-ja405:5.4_0: I recollect it like one who has wakened from sleep.
ai-ja405:6.2_0: by a fierce dragon desiring human flesh,
ai-ja405:6.3_0: you freed it, strength and strength.
ai-ja405:6.4_0: That’s the precepts and observances you practiced in the past.
ai-ja405:6.5_0: I recollect it like one who has wakened from sleep.
ai-ja405:7.1_0: I used to be your servant named Kappa.
ai-ja405:7.2_0: You thought he was intelligent and loyal.
ai-ja405:7.3_0: That’s the precepts and observances you practiced in the past.
ai-ja405:7.4_0: I recollect it like one who has wakened from sleep.”
ai-ja405:8.1_0: “You certainly understand this life span of mine.
ai-ja405:8.2_0: And you know that you’re the Buddha.
ai-ja405:9.2_0: The first sub-chapter on mouthfuls is finished.
ai-ja405:11.2_0: Then to the winnowing Mount Vepulla,
ai-ja405:11.3_0: Again and again, the beggars beg;
ai-ja405:11.4_0: Then the Subrahmā, who was mature,
